resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
See [https://devblogs.microsoft.com/devops/hosted-pipelines-image-deprecation/#windows]

We should replace it with windows-2019 

I am not sure if this will require other changes in the setup, will open PR to test it. cc [~raulcd]
fields.summary: [CI] Update azure windows image as vs2017-win2016 is retired
